categories.name: Prayer for the Future of the Dharma
categories.enDesc: Popularly known as 'The Teachings Blaze' (bstan 'bar ma), this prayer for the spread of the teachings (bstan rgyas smon lam) is especially popular in the Gelug tradition. The first verse appears to be taken from the Pratimokṣa-sūtra (so sor thar pa'i mdo), while the remainder of the prayer, from the second verse onwards, is to be found in Atiśa Dīpaṃkara's Great Compendium of the Sūtras (Mahāsūtrasamuccaya; mdo kun las btus pa chen po).

books.title: Prayer for the Future of the Dharma
content: To the buddhas: Vipaśyin, Śikhin, Viśvabhū
And Śākyamuni—Gautama, deity of all deities
To the seven warrior-like buddhas, I pay homage!
In the past, to benefit being
I bore all kinds of hardship
And gave up my own happiness, through this
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
In the past, for the sake of the sick
So, to protect the needy and the poor,
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
By my giving up sons, daughters, and wives
For the sake of the treasure of enlightenment
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Through the offerings I made to the buddhas, pratyekabuddhas
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Seeking instruction for the sake of enlightenment
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
And my offerings to the buddhas of ten directions
May the teachings blaze, long into the future
Through my diligence in the past
Constantly stable, and overcoming others’ disruption
So as to liberate all beings
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Through my constant practice of patience
And my tolerance of beings’ harmful acts
Caused by the degeneration of their negative emotions
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Through my concentration, perfect freedoms,2 formless absorptions
And samādhis as many as the grains of sand in the river Ganges
Through the power of my meditation
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Through seeking wisdom in the past
By practising austerities in the forest
And teaching countless śāstras to others
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!
Through giving, out of love, my flesh and blood
And giving arms and legs and every part of my body
May the way of the Dharma flourish and expand!
In the past, with loving kindness, I caused
Harmful sentient beings to mature completely,
And I led them to the three vehicles; through this
May the gift of Dharma thrive and grow!
In the past, with skilful means and wisdom
I liberated sentient beings from perverse views
And led them to the correct view; through this
May the Dharma increase in every way!
With the four means of attracting disciples
I released beings from the fire of the emotions
And vanquished rampant negativity; through this
May my followers remain, long into the future!
From the rivers of different views
And led them to the correct view; through this
May my followers always have devotion!
May the teachings blaze, long into the future!”

books.title: Prayer for the Future of the Dharma [sw]
content: Na Śākyamuni—Gautama, mungu wa miungu wote
Kwa mabuddha saba kama wapiganaji, nawasujudu!
Na nikajiachia furaha yangu mwenyewe, kupitia hii
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Kwa kutoa watoto, binti, na wake
Kwa ajili ya hazina ya ufahamu
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Kupitia kutoa kwangu kwa mabuddha, pratyekabuddhas
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Nikitafuta mafundisho kwa ajili ya ufahamu
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Na asili ya asili ya umonaki wa umri mrefu
Na kwa kutoa kwa mabuddha wa mwelekeo wa kumi
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo
Daima thabiti, na kuwashinda wengine wanaoleta vurugu
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Kupitia mazoezi yangu ya kuvumilia daima
Na uvumilivu wa vitendo viovu vya viumbe
Vilivyosababishwa na kuzorota kwa hisia hasi
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Na samādhis kama idadi ya punje za mchanga katika mto Ganges
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Na kufundisha mafundisho yasiyohesabika kwa wengine
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Kwa kutoa, kwa upendo, nyama yangu na damu
Na kutoa mikono na miguu na kila sehemu ya mwili wangu
Ninaomba njia ya Dharma ifanikiwe na kupanuka!
Zamani, kwa upendo na wema, nilisababisha
Na kuwaongoza kwenye magari matatu; kupitia hii
Ninaomba zawadi ya Dharma ifanikiwe na kukua!
Zamani, kwa njia za werevu na hekima
Nilikomboa viumbe kutoka kwa mitazamo mibaya
Na kuwaongoza kwenye mtazamo sahihi; kupitia hii
Ninaomba Dharma iongezeke kwa kila njia!
Kwa njia nne za kuwavuta wanafunzi
Niliwaokoa viumbe kutoka kwa moto wa hisia
Na kuangamiza hasira isiyo na kizuizi; kupitia hii
Ninaomba wafuasi wangu waendelee, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
Kutoka kwa mito ya mitazamo tofauti
Na kuwaongoza kwenye mtazamo sahihi; kupitia hii
Ninaomba wafuasi wangu wawe na uaminifu daima!
Ninaomba mafundisho yateketeze, kwa muda mrefu katika siku zijazo!
